SEARCH
Package Photos71.src.model.accounts

Class User

java.lang.Object
Photos71.src.model.accounts.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class User extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a user in the photo album application with functionality to manage personal albums, search for photos by tags and date range, and maintain a viewable album.
Author:
Yash Puranik, Joseph Arrigo

  • Method Details

    • orTagSearch

      public ArrayList<Photo> orTagSearch(ArrayList<Tag> searchTags, String albumName)
      Searches for photos across albums that match any of the given tags.
      Parameters:
      searchTags - The list of tags to match.
      albumName - The name of the album to restrict the search to, or "*" for all albums.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of photos that match any of the tags.

    • andTagSearch

      public ArrayList<Photo> andTagSearch(ArrayList<Tag> searchTags, String albumName)
      Searches for photos across albums that match all of the given tags.
      Parameters:
      searchTags - The list of tags to match.
      albumName - The name of the album to restrict the search to, or "*" for all albums.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of photos that match all of the tags.

    • getPhotosInRange

      public ArrayList<Photo> getPhotosInRange(Calendar date1, Calendar date2, String albumName)
      Retrieves photos within a specified date range across all albums or a single album.
      Parameters:
      date1 - The starting date of the range.
      date2 - The ending date of the range.
      albumName - The name of the album to restrict the search to, or "*" for all albums.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of photos within the specified date range.

      public ArrayList<String> getAlbumNameList()

      An ArrayList of album names.

      newName - The new album name.

    • doesAlbumHave

      public Boolean doesAlbumHave(Photo in, String albumName)
      Checks if an album contains a specific photo.
      Parameters:
      in - The Photo to check.
      albumName - The name of the album to check for the photo.
      Returns:
      true if the album contains the photo, false otherwise.

    • getAlbum

      public Album getAlbum(String name)
      Retrieves the Album object for a given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the album to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Album object if it exists, null otherwise.

    • lookAt

      public boolean lookAt(String albumName)
      Sets the album the user is currently looking at.
      Parameters:
      albumName - The name of the album to look at.
      Returns:
      true if the album exists and is set to be viewed, false otherwise.

    • getLookAt

      public Album getLookAt()
      Gets the album the user is currently looking at.
      Returns:
      The Album object the user is currently viewing, or null if none.
